title: Breaking Fast At Someones House
description: Authentic supplications for Breaking Fast At Someones House
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Breaking Fast At Someones House. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 184
items.arabic: ((أَفْطَرَ عِنْدَكُمُ الصَّائِمُونَ، وَأَكَلَ طَعَامَكُمُ الْأَبْرَارُ، وَصَلَّتْ عَلَيْكُمُ الْمَلاَئِكَةُ)).
items.transliteration: Aftara AAindakumus-sa-imoon, wa-akala taAAamakumul-abrar, wasallat AAalaykumul-mala-ikah.
items.translation: May the fasting break their fast in your home, and may the dutiful and pious eat your food, and may the angles send prayers upon you.
